ide.DefnForCursor{defnSpan: DS} :-
  ide.Cursor{idx: CIdx} &
  scope.Var{span: span{from: FIdx, to: TIdx}, name: N, scopeID: Scope} &
  FIdx <= CIdx & CIdx <= TIdx &
  scope.Usage{name: N, usageScopeID: Scope, defnSpan: DS}.
